channel.title: CVE Feed for HGiga -- MailSherlock MSR45/SSR45
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HGiga -- MailSherlock MSR45/SSR45

item.title: CVE-2020-25848|2024-08-04T15:49:05.445Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock%20msr45%2Fssr45
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock contains weak authentication flaw that attackers grant privilege remotely with default password generation mechanism.

item.title: CVE-2020-35743|2024-08-04T17:09:15.204Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock%20msr45%2Fssr45
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock contains a SQL injection flaw. Attackers can inject and launch SQL commands in a URL parameter of specific cgi pages.

item.title: CVE-2020-35742|2024-08-04T17:09:15.146Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock%20msr45%2Fssr45
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock contains a vulnerability of SQL Injection. Attackers can inject and launch SQL commands in a URL parameter.

item.title: CVE-2020-25850|2024-08-04T15:49:05.969Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock%20msr45%2Fssr45
item.description: The function, view the source code, of HGiga MailSherlock does not validate specific characters. Remote attackers can use this flaw to download arbitrary system files.

item.title: CVE-2020-35851|2024-08-04T17:16:13.138Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock%20msr45%2Fssr45
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock does not validate specific parameters properly. Attackers can use the vulnerability to launch Command inject attacks remotely and execute arbitrary commands of the system.

item.title: CVE-2020-35741|2024-08-04T17:09:15.252Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock%20msr45%2Fssr45
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock does not validate user parameters on multiple login pages. Attackers can use the vulnerability to inject JavaScript syntax for XSS attacks.

item.title: CVE-2020-35740|2024-08-04T17:09:15.246Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock%20msr45%2Fssr45
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock does not validate specific URL parameters properly that allows attackers to inject JavaScript syntax for XSS attacks.
